name: places/ChIJtxcUty73wokRBvnAzBQh5vQ
formattedAddress: 1590 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1590 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: Just had the most wild interaction with this pharmacy. I asked my Dr to fill send my medication here, got a message from them this morning saying it was being prepared. Called in to see if it was ready. He asked for my DOB, I gave it. He kept repeating date wrong (January rather than July and wrong date). I corrected it. Him:  "We don't have it here, nothing for January. Have your Doctor resend." Me: "Sir, not January, July." He kept cutting me off that he didn't have anything for Jan 27. Not my birthday! I repeated it again. Him: "No don't have anything." So, "how come you texted?" I asked. Then he hung up on me lol. Save yourself time.  Just go with the Duane Reade down the block. these people don't want your business.

originalText.text: Best experience I've had a pharmacy. I came here for my flu shot and booster. From when I called to see if there were appointments available, Ahsaan and the staff were incredibly helpful and courteous. After that experience, I've decided to move all of my prescriptions to Bliss -- even if it is a bit out of the way. Small interactions in which people treat you with kindness and respect have an outsized impact on your day, and I can say that my interaction with the folks at Bliss yesterday was the highlight of my day / had a big impact on my day. So much so that I'm giving it my first Google review. Keep up the great work, Ahsaan and team!

originalText.text: I visited this pharmacy to receive my booster shot. And I was a little nervous because I am afraid of needles. Once I was in the area to get my booster Dr. Qadir asked me a couple of questions and I started to relax. Once I received my shot he told me to wait about 10 minutes. I loved the atmosphere and that it is an Family Owned Pharmacy.

originalText.text: My family has been using this pharmacy since I was a little girl. Even though we moved out of the neighborhood, i still pick up medications from there because of their great service!

originalText.text:
Bliss Pharmacy is truly a Pharmacy that provided excellent service to
the community. Mohammad and Ahsaan go above and beyond to meet
the customers pharmacy needs.

I personally prefer Bliss over CVS and Duane Reade Pharmacy.
